```ui_example
<joy-text>
    I am a basic wrapper for paragraphs, with some <strong>important content</strong> and some <joy-link href="https://malt.fr" target="_blank">external links</joy-link>.
    <small>Maybe some small content as well. Don't use any classes on me, I don't need it</small>
</joy-text>
```
